title: Newark Strawberry Festival
details: TLGYO.ORG will be attending the festival in an unofficial capicity. TLGYO.ORG volunteers will be providing literature and other helpful program information. Event signup for future events will be available, and TLGYO.ORG will be accepting donations, and other contributions while at this event. For more ianformation email us at hello@tlgyo.org.
